/>
VIII.iii.3.A.2.b
.
Forwarding Claims and Legacy Appeals to the Muskogee RO
Use the table below to determine how to route claims and legacy appeals based on exposure to mustard gas or Lewisite to the Muskogee RO.
If the claims folder is in …
Then …
paper format
send the claims folder to
Department of Veterans Affairs
VARO Muskogee (
21-Mustard Gas
)
Federal Building
125 S. Main Street
Muskogee, OK 74401
electronic format
ensure the
Mustard Gas
special issue indicator is affixed to the relevant contention(s).
Note
:  If a mustard gas claim is already under the jurisdiction of the Muskogee RO and a subsequent claim is received, the Muskogee RO will process the subsequent claim.
Reference
:  For more information on priority processing, see
M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, 1
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iii, Chapter 3, Section A - Developing Claims for Service Connection (SC) for Disabilities Resulting From Exposure to Mustard Gas or Lewisite
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iii, Chapter 3, Section A
